basics.name: Nick Keator
basics.label: Mechanical Engineer
basics.summary: An experienced mechanical engineer with professional experience in the hyperscale ML/AI server space.

work.name: ZT Systems
work.summary: Design engineer focusing on hyperscale GPU servers, I run simulations to assist with the development cycle as well as contribute to design and validation.

work.name: NJIT
work.summary: Worked as a student worker during the initial launch of the NJIT makerspace. I assisted with developing training materials, monitoring and helping students, and machining components for extracurricular teams.

courses: Introduction to Fuel Cells and Batteries
Matrix Tensor Methods in Mechanical Engineering
Finite Element Methods in Mechanical Engineering

awards.title: ZT Systems Patent Recognition:
awards.summary: Acknowledged for contributing to a novel heatsink design, enhancing thermal efficiency.

certificates.name: Computing in Python I: Fundamentals and Procedural Programming
Computing in Python II: Control Structures
Computing in Python III: Data Structures
Computing in Python IV: Objects & Algorithms
